Events.Title:
Paple visited the forge and blessed the site.

Uni.lu Welcome Day.
Knowledge is money: Get 200 B-coins

Blast Furnace Tour by Night
Go to start

The Escher Kulturlaf happened
You broke your leg: Go to the next public transport and pay 50 B-coins for the hospital fees.

TEDx Conference happened.You meet Varan Pathmanathan creator of make!mpact
He likes your idea and invest 50 B-coins

Grand Ducal Visit: He gives you his blessing
Next rent has not to be payed

Nuit de la Culture happend.
The piano flew away with the hot air balloon.
You try to catch it back
Move 5 fields forwards

Uni.lu Open Day at Belval.
Due to it's success you are forced to go to erasmus
Go to erasmus

Rockhal Music Event
Move to the Rockhal

You organise the Red Rock Challenge
You donate 150 B-coins to "Fondatioun Kriibskrank kanner"
